statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT last_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Online Shoppers';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Students'
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4)
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 25
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC

SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE products.category = 'electronics'
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 3

SELECT customer_name, product_name, category FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.age > 30 ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, street, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, amount FROM purchases ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, action_type, action_date FROM actions WHERE action_type = 'login' ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, street, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE state = 'CA' AND city = 'San Francisco'
SELECT name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT customer_id, action_type, action_date, description FROM actions WHERE action_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY action_date
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.ad_name FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN ads a ON i.ad_id = a.ad_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY p.total_amount DESC;
